events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to return it and get a refund since it clearly doesn't match the size chart.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request to return the item and get their money back.
The case has been assigned to support agent Sarah Jones to handle the refund request for the incorrect sizing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear the jacket didn't fit. Let's work together to process your return and refund quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and has not been worn beyond trying it on at home.
Thank you for the details. I have arranged a prepaid return shipping label for you. Once we receive the jacket back, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I appreciate the smooth process and look forward to my refund.
The returned jacket was received and inspected. Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution of your return case.
Yes, I have received the refund on my card today. Thank you for the excellent service and quick handling of my request.
The case has been officially closed based on successful refund issuance and positive customer confirmation.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback regarding their refund case experience.
